Mineral/s Included:: Required: Calcic Plagioclase (Ca(Al2Si2O8)), ClinoPyroxene (ADSi2O6) Common: Olivine (Typically (Mg, Fe)2SiO4), Quartz (SiO2)

Mineral Common Colors:: Plagioclase- Usually white, gray;                                     ClinoPyroxene- white, grey, green;                                     Olivine- green, orange, white;                                     Quartz- clear;

Isometric System/s:: Minerals common- quartz (silica /SiO2), hematite (Iron oxide /Fe2O3), magnetite (Iron oxide /Fe3O4), Calcite (CaCO3)
